instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for body text and 'Playfair Display' for headings. Import them from Google Fonts.
Implement smooth scrolling using 'lenis' or standard CSS scroll-behavior.
Ensure the Configurator iframe is responsive and has a loading state.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections.
The 'Nature-Lux' aesthetic relies on deep dark backgrounds and gold accents. Do not use white backgrounds.
For the Product Showcase, use a Bento Grid layout with varying cell sizes for visual interest.
All text must be in Polish as provided in the sections above.
